entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Smiths Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:23 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.2°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
